meanings.definition: To perfume with incense or other fragrant substances.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the priest will be censing the altar.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys censing her home with lavender incense.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the censer while censing the room, creating a fragrant mess.
meanings.sent4: The morning mist censing the valley with a sweet aroma.
meanings.sent5: The chef was censing the dish with a sprinkle of herbs before serving.

meanings.definition: The act of perfuming with incense or other fragrant substances.
meanings.sent1: The censing of the room filled the air with a pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: The priest performed the censing of the church before the service.
meanings.sent3: The censing at the spa made the customers feel relaxed and rejuvenated.
meanings.sent4: The censing of the garden attracted butterflies with its sweet scent.
meanings.sent5: The censing during the ceremony added a touch of spirituality to the event.
